talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It is so dark that it is difficult to see too
well. <sp:5:0:0>However, I found some <clr:0000>blue stones<clr:ffff>
of exceptional quality in that cave there.
Alas, they are extremely heavy!<sp:0:4:0>If I could manage to carry back just <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
then I could show off the skills that I
learned from Master Dento.
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hm?!<sp:5:1:0> Could it...<sp:5:0:0>possibly be true?


That dazzling sight I behold! Could that
be the <clr:0000>blue stone <clr:ffff>from the cave?!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Ah... I see. <sp:5:0:0>Upon a closer inspection,
you are already making good use of it.
Good for you!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>Hm.<sp:5:1:0> If only I could acquire one that was
not already in use so that I could use it
for repairs.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sigh_00>Link, the <clr:0000>blue stone <clr:ffff>that you brought
seems to already be in use.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm... <sp:5:1:0>If only it had not been used for
anything yet.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Oh! Link!<sp:5:0:0> Thanks to your most noble
efforts, East Reservoir Lake is as clean
as ever.
I was so happy, <sp:5:0:0>I immediately went for a
swim for the first time in far too long.
<sp:5:0:0>When I did, I found a wondrous <clr:0000>stone<clr:ffff>.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>You see, <sp:5:0:0>it is inside of that cave
over yonder.

All of the<clr:0000> blue stones <clr:ffff>there are of
stunning quality.

<snd:Trouble_00>Alas, they are also stunningly heavy!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0301>If I tried to swim with one,<sp:5:0:0> it would be so
heavy I would sink in no time and end up
in the depths, wildly swinging my flippers!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>All right! I shall now set off to begin my
repair work!

<sp:3:0:2:0101>Link! <sp:5:0:0>It is so fortuitous that you were
here to help!<sp:5:0:0> Thank you, truly!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>*sigh* <sp:5:0:0>If only I had <clr:0000>one <clr:ffff>of those <clr:0000>stones<clr:ffff>,
I would be able to work in earnest on
fixing up Mipha Court.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>A thousand times, I thank you!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Now I can fix up Mipha Court!


Link! You MUST allow me to thank you.
Please, take this, along with my gratitude
and complete awe!
This is some elegant fabric that has the
Zora emblem stitched on to it. I hope
you like it!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It is simply too difficult to hold that <clr:0000>stone<clr:ffff>
and swim...
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Trouble_00>I found some high-quality<clr:0000> blue stones<clr:ffff> at
the cave on the edge of the reservoir, but
they are too heavy to carry on my own.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>As a craftsman, <sp:5:0:0>I would love to show off
the skills that I have learned from Master
Dento by working with that <clr:0000>stone<clr:ffff>. Alas...
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I found some high-quality <clr:0000>blue stones<clr:ffff>
in that cave over there,<sp:5:0:0> but they are
incredibly heavy.
If I could manage to carry back just <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
then I could show off the skills that I
learned from Master Dento.
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Ahem.<sp:5:0:0> Erm.<sp:5:1:0> I lost my composure for a
moment there. <sp:5:1:0>Such are the depths of
my joy.
Did you, by chance,<sp:5:0:0> carry this heavy
stone all the way here?
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>The weather is such that you cannot see it
so well at present, <sp:5:0:0>but it is inside of that
cave over yonder.
All of the<clr:0000> blue stones <clr:ffff>there are of
stunning quality.

<snd:Trouble_00>Alas, they are also stunningly heavy!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0301>If I tried to swim with one, it would be so
heavy I would sink in no time and end up
in the depths, wildly swinging my flippers!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Trouble_01>Normally I would enlist a large team to
help with this task, but everyone is so
busy... <sp:5:0:0>Alas, I am in turmoil here!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That! There!<sp:5:1:0> That is unmistakably the
<clr:0000>blue stone <clr:ffff>from inside the cave!

However...<sp:5:0:0> It looks as though you are
already using it for something important.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hm.<sp:5:1:0> If only I could acquire one that
was not already in use so that I could
use it for repairs.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>It is so dark that you cannot see it too
well at present, <sp:5:0:0>but it is inside of that
cave over yonder.
All of the<clr:0000> blue stones <clr:ffff>there are of
stunning quality.

<snd:Trouble_00>Alas, they are also stunningly heavy!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0301>If I tried to swim with one, it would be so
heavy I would sink in no time and end up
in the depths, wildly swinging my flippers!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>AH! <sp:5:0:0>That stone!<sp:5:0:0> Yes, that is it!<sp:5:0:0> That is IT!


<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>That wondrous stooone!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>The weather is such that I cannot see so
well. However,<sp:5:0:0> I found some <clr:0000>blue stones<clr:ffff>
of exceptional quality in that cave there.
Alas, they are extremely heavy!<sp:0:4:0>If I could manage to carry back just <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:0:0>
then I could show off the skills that I
learned from Master Dento.
